Package org.centrale.objet.WoE

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.centrale.objet.WoE.World
  • public class World
extends Object
    The class World represents a world that contains different roles like Personnage(Archer,Paysan, Guerrier) and Monstre(Lapin, Loup), the role Personnage can attack Monstre through the method combattre, it can also restore vitality through the use of PationSoin.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    wuzilong, ZouKang

        Returns:

      • numberRandom

        public int numberRandom()
        generate a random number between 1-5. 1 for Archer, 2 for Paysan, 3 for Lapin, 4 for Guerrier, 5 for Loup.
        Returns:
        a random number

        public void geneArrayList​(int nbCreature,
                          ArrayList<Creature> creatures)
        Generate an ArrayList of type Creature. The type of elements it contains is generated by random.
        Parameters:
        nbCreature - The number of elements we want to generate.
        creatures - Save elements to this ArrayList
